nodes.text: Alan Davis (born June 18, 1956) is a British comic book illustrator who has worked on numerous titles both in the U.K. and in the U.S., most notably Marvel Comics' Uncanny X-Men with Chris Claremont, as well as Excalibur, Captain Britain and Clan Destine. His Star Wars work includes the comics Dark Knight's Devilry and Rust Never Sleeps.
